title: Matogrosso Script released @Veer
content:
Submitted by [Ale Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103132957/http:/typophile.com/user/827 "View user profile.") : 28.Apr.2009 5.35am 

**[Matogrosso Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103132957/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000429#specimen)**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103132957im_/http:/typophile.com/files/matogrossoflickr_5206.jpg)

A new rustic calligraphic script from Argentine calligraphy team Koziupa and Paul. Ideal to use on wine labels or organic food packaging, stationery and old maps. It also makes a great choice for designs relating to outdoor activities and rugged travel, where the concept of the wild is to be accentuated.

**[Matogrossoâ€™s](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103132957/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000429#specimen)** OpenType programming combines several alternate lowercase characters to generate perfect fit and more natural textures.

Visit **[Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103132957/http:/www.sudtipos.com/)**.
author: Ale Paul
